Title: Step 1: Finding the Hunting Hut
Text: I need to find the Pinoros Hunting Hut where Ranger Samuel is waiting for me. The hut is located in the middle of Pinoros Forest, a dense pine forest on a hill in the south of Gramados Island. I should take the road that leads to the southernmost point of the island and look for a small picnic stop called Pinoros Picnic Stop. From there, I'll need to follow the hiking path to the wooden hunting hut.
CompleteText: I've found the Pinoros Hunting Hut. Ranger Samuel is here, ready to brief me on the task ahead.
